Player History
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1965, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1965...
Traded from Cincinnati to New York (A) on 7/4/1966 (Going to CIN: CF M. Mantle. Going to NYY: RF V. Pinson, C G. Tenace, 2B L. Boehmer, LF T. Harper)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Minnesota on 6/20/1967...
Injured on 5/25/1970 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/8/1971 to a 3-year deal worth $850,000 per year...
